It's a gripping thriller that tells the story of a rookie cop and his unconventional training day with a seasoned, yet morally ambiguous detective played by Denzel Washington. The plot is filled with unexpected twists and turns that will keep you on the edge of your seat!

If you're looking for something a bit different, "This Is Spinal Tap" might also appeal to you. It's a comedic mockumentary about an English heavy metal band, featuring an ensemble cast including Christopher Guest, Michael McKean, and Harry Shearer. Their absurd antics are sure to bring a laugh!
